languages.text: Священные реликвии, сотворенные во имя прославления Императора, напоенные упованием на Него и благословленные верующими в Него. Где есть они, там отступает тьма богохульная.
Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.
languages.original_text: Священные реликвии, сотворенные во имя прославления Императора, напоенные упованием на Него и благословленные верующими в Него. Где есть они, там отступает тьма богохульная.

traits.locale_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, filled with trust in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.
Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, filled with trust in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.
Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.
Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.
Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.

languages.text: Reliquias sagradas creadas para mayor gloria del Emperador. La fe depositada en ellas por los fieles que las han bendecido brilla con luz propia y su mera presencia basta para que la blasfema oscuridad retroceda.
languages.original_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.

traits.locale_text: Reliquias sagradas creadas para mayor gloria del Emperador. La fe depositada en ellas por los fieles que las han bendecido brilla con luz propia y su mera presencia basta para que la blasfema oscuridad retroceda.

languages.text: Des reliques sacrées créées à la gloire de l'Empereur, la matérialisation de professions de foi bénies par ses fidèles. Leur seule présence suffit à faire reculer les ténèbres de l'hérésie.
languages.original_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.

traits.locale_text: Des reliques sacrées créées à la gloire de l'Empereur, la matérialisation de professions de foi bénies par ses fidèles. Leur seule présence suffit à faire reculer les ténèbres de l'hérésie.

languages.text: 以赞美神皇的名义创造的圣物，其中灌注了对神皇的无限忠诚，经受过信仰的赐福。崇高的圣物可驱除一切亵渎的黑暗。
languages.original_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.

traits.locale_text: 以赞美神皇的名义创造的圣物，其中灌注了对神皇的无限忠诚，经受过信仰的赐福。崇高的圣物可驱除一切亵渎的黑暗。

languages.text: 聖なる遺物は、皇帝を賛美するという名目で作られ、信仰にあふれ、忠実な信者たちによって祝福される。その存在そのものが、冒涜の闇を跳ね返すものなのだ。
languages.original_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.

traits.locale_text: 聖なる遺物は、皇帝を賛美するという名目で作られ、信仰にあふれ、忠実な信者たちによって祝福される。その存在そのものが、冒涜の闇を跳ね返すものなのだ。

languages.text: Heilige Relikte, die im Namen des Imperators erschaffen wurden, voll des Glaubens an ihn sind und von seinen gläubigen Anhängern gesegnet wurden. Ihre bloße Anwesenheit lässt die Dunkelheit der Blasphemie zurückschrecken.
languages.original_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.

traits.locale_text: Heilige Relikte, die im Namen des Imperators erschaffen wurden, voll des Glaubens an ihn sind und von seinen gläubigen Anhängern gesegnet wurden. Ihre bloße Anwesenheit lässt die Dunkelheit der Blasphemie zurückschrecken.

languages.text: İmparatoru yüceltmek adına yapılmış ve O'na inananlarca kutsanmış, inançla dolup taşan kutsal yadigârlar. Varlıkları bile kâfirliğin karanlığının geri çekilmesi için yeterlidir.
languages.original_text: Sacred relics created in the name of praising the Emperor, brimming with faith in Him, and blessed by His faithful. Their very presence makes the darkness of blasphemy recoil.
